name: udacity-hosting-a-full-stack-application-udagram
description: Hosting the Udacity Udagram Full Stack Application on AWS.

scripts.api:build: cd udagram-api && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.api:test: cd udagram-api && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.api:deploy: cd udagram-api && npm run deploy && cd ..
scripts.fe:build: cd udagram-frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.fe:test: cd udagram-frontend && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.fe:deploy: cd udagram-frontend && npm run deploy && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: npm run api:install && npm run fe:install

author: Mohamed Abotalb <mohamedabotalb276@gmail.com>
